dc6400e1-f3fa-4bcd-a59d-28e32ad36aab.description: Acknowledgement of completion to the AWS Research Alliance Program 2022, an exclusive community of exceptional researchers, scientists and research IT customers within Public Sector that are passionate about using AWS Cloud to drive research and innovation in their organisation and accelerate time to science.
dc6400e1-f3fa-4bcd-a59d-28e32ad36aab.name: AWS PS Research Alliance 2022 Program Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by AWS Public Sector ANZO Tech Team

entity.name: AWS Public Sector ANZO Tech Team

badge_template_activities.title: The AWS Public Sector Research Alliance is an exclusive community of exceptional researchers and research IT leaders amongst the AWS Public Sector customers that are passionate about using AWS Cloud to drive research and innovation in their organisation and accelerate time to science! Members demonstrate aptitude or expertise in using AWS for research in their organisations, and are technical leaders and influencers.

701bb056-5a95-4ed9-a956-0c40cc6ceac1.description: Acknowledgement of completion to the AWS Cloud Alliance Program 2022, an exclusive community of passionate Public Sector leaders who drive innovation to improve the lives of citizens with AWS.
701bb056-5a95-4ed9-a956-0c40cc6ceac1.name: AWS PS Cloud Alliance 2022 Program Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by AWS Public Sector ANZO Tech Team

entity.name: AWS Public Sector ANZO Tech Team

badge_template_activities.title: The AWS ANZO Public Sector Cloud Alliance is an exclusive community of exceptional AWS Public Sector customers that are passionate about using AWS Cloud! The program seeks to create a community of key influencers and technology trailblazers to share information, drive innovation and improve the lives of ANZO citizens.
